amendment.description: To repeal certain tax benefits relating to oil and gas wells intangible drilling and development costs.

action.text: Amendment SA 2609 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2609 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 332.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2609.

Amendment SA 2609 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S13081-13085, S13102; text: CR S13082) To repeal certain tax benefits relating to oil and gas wells intangible drilling and development costs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2609 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 332.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2609 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
